sentences.en: Can this apparent dish - body coupling unstabilise the guidance loop?
sentences.cn: 这种明显的天线 - 弹体耦合,能否导致制导回路不稳定?

sentences.en: Can this apparent dish - body coupling unstabilize the guidance loop?
sentences.cn: 这种明显的天线 - 弹体耦合能使制导回路不稳定 吗 ?

sentences.en: George Bush denied he was in the loop regarding the Irangate scandal.
sentences.cn: 乔治·布什否认他是伊朗门事件的主宰人物之一.

sentences.en: He looped the rope over the wood.
sentences.cn: 他把绳子打了环系在木头上。

sentences.en: I think that the vice president was in the loop.
sentences.cn: 我认为副总统是局内人。

sentences.en: Loop that end of the rope through this and knot it.
sentences.cn: 把绳子的这一头儿从这里穿过然后打结.

sentences.en: Loop the rope around the pole.
Mrs. Morrell reached for a loop of garden hose.
sentences.cn: 莫雷尔夫人伸手去拿一圈橡胶软管。

sentences.en: She put a loop of rope around the cow's neck.
sentences.cn: 她把绳子圈套到奶牛的脖子上.

sentences.en: The ball looped over the goalkeeper into the back of the net.
sentences.cn: 那个球绕过守门员射入网底。

sentences.en: The loop of string makes a handle for the parcel.
sentences.cn: 细绳结的环做成包裹的拎襻.

sentences.en: The loop of wire was still around his right fist.
sentences.cn: 他右手腕上仍然挽着那圈电线.

sentences.en: The plane looped the loop three times.
The road makes a wide loop around the lake.
The self - loop of course, could be drawn with the arrow either way.
sentences.cn: 自然, 环按其方向可以画在下面也可以画在上面.

sentences.en: These activists don't want to feel out of the loop.
sentences.cn: 这些活跃分子不想做局外人。

sentences.en: This control may be closed loop or open loop.
sentences.cn: 控制可以是开环的也可以是闭环的.

words.tran_cn: 打环的人；打环装置；尺蠖（等于measuring worm）
成圈；打环（loop的过去式和过去分词）
打成环状；把导线连成回路；缠（loop的ing形式）
环；圈；弯曲部分；[航]翻筋斗

phrases.tran_cn: 在消息圈内；在决策圈内；在参与机密的智囊团内
内循环；内环路；局部回路
环形系统，环状管网；闭合系统

phrases.phrase: throw (或 knock) someone for a loop

trans.tran_cn: 圈，环，[医]宫内避孕环，回路，弯曲部分
trans.tran_en: a shape like a curve or a circle made by a line curving back towards itself, or a piece of wire, string etc that has this shape

trans.tran_cn: （使）成环，（使）成圈，以环连结，使翻筋斗
trans.tran_en: to make a loop or make something into a loop
a shape like a curve or a circle made by a line curving back towards itself, or a piece of wire, string etc that has this shape
